text: The Reward of the Faithless is a 1917 American silent drama film directed by Rex Ingram and starring Claire Du Brey, Betty Schade and Wedgwood Nowell.Gmür p.412 ==Cast== * Claire Du Brey as Princess Dione * Betty Schade as Anna * Wedgwood Nowell as Guido Campanelli * Nicholas Dunaew as Feodor Strogoff * Dick La Reno as Prince Paul Ragusin * William J. Dyer as Peter Vlasoff * Yvette Mitchell as Anna Vlasoff * J. Edwin Brown as Karl * Bill Rathbone as A Cripple ==References== ==Bibliography== * Leonhard Gmür. Rex Ingram: Hollywood's Rebel of the Silver Screen. 2013. ==External links== * Category:1917 films Category:1917 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Rex Ingram Category:American black-and-white films Category:Universal Pictures films
title: The Reward of the Faithless
